functions.name: MachineLoweringPhase::Run
functions.logic: This function executes the machine lowering phase in the Turboshaft compiler. It currently uses CopyingPhase with several reducers (StringEscapeAnalysisReducer, JSGenericLoweringReducer, DataViewLoweringReducer, MachineLoweringReducer, FastApiCallLoweringReducer, VariableReducer, SelectLoweringReducer, MachineOptimizationReducer) to perform the lowering transformations. It also contains a TODO comment about potentially moving JSGenericLoweringReducer to the SimplifiedLowering phase in the future.
